Quickstrike/Terrorsaur:




Quickstrike followed the mouse to the battlefield, but couldn't quite 
keep up with her. Four legs could carry faster than eight. As he 
arrived, he transformed to robot mode, and looked around and the 
battle. He couldn't count how many there were. He found his own spot 
near Dark Mouse, who he finnally got to.


Terrorsaur soared above, not absolutely clear what the battle was 
for, but battle was battle, and it had to be fought. He was Predacon. 
Fighting was his obligation. He transformed to robot mode and readied 
his gun.
